about_the_game:
Tophet – A 4-Player Co-op Horror Experience

One ordinary night at the foster home, you and the other foster children are woken by a terrifying scream from downstairs. As you step into the darkness, the once-familiar home twists into something sinister. What’s lurking in the shadows? What happened to your foster parents?

Survive the Horror Together

Tophet is an immersive multiplayer survival horror game where you and your friends must work together to uncover the chilling mystery of the cursed foster farmhouse. Gather items, solve puzzles, and evade relentless horrors in a desperate fight for survival. Can you unravel the house’s dark past... or will it claim you, too?

Key Features:

  • 4-Player Co-Op: Team up with up to 4 players for a truly immersive co-op horror experience. Trust your friends, or face the terror alone.

  • Interactive Monsters & Curses: Encounter dynamic enemies and supernatural curses that react to your every move, ensuring no two playthroughs are the same.

  • Engaging Investigation: Explore a chilling environment as you uncover the truth behind the evil forces that haunt the foster home.

  • Unreal Engine 5 Powered: Experience stunning graphics and terrifying atmospheric details brought to life by the power of Unreal Engine 5.

  • Solo Developed: A uniquely terrifying experience, handcrafted by a passionate solo developer.

The Horror Awaits…

Gather your friends, prepare for the worst, and face the unimaginable horrors lurking within. The truth of what happened to your foster parents is just the beginning. Will you survive the night?

Mature Content Description

This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

content_descriptors.notes: The only "mature content" in this game is blood, violence against fantasy monsters, and fantasy gore.

  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: i3-10100F / Ryzen 3 3100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1660 Super / Radeon RX 590

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 3060 ti / AMD 6700 XT

short_description: Your childhood wasn’t what it seemed. Search the darkness, uncover secrets, and face the terrifying truth. 4-player co-op with proximity chat—stick together or be lost to the lurking terror. Your friends are your only lifeline. Will you survive?
